text: Myristica guatteriifolia is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Indonesia, Malaysia, Myanmar, the Philippines, and Vietnam. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica guatteriifolia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
